optionsCompactModeExplanation.message: El Modo compacto reduce la altura de las pestañas para mostrar más. En Ajustes dinámicos, se activará automáticamente cuando no quede más espacio.

contextMenuNoContainer.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=153932 and https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=153933. Context menu item label.

notificationDeletedMessage.message: Haz clic en la notificación para deshacer.
notificationDeletedMessage.description: Title of the notification when deleting many tabs.

optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.message: Hacer clic en la pestaña activa para cambiar a la anteriormente activa.
optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.description: Explanation for the Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsThemeIntegrationExplanation.message: Usar el tema del navegador en lugar del tema predeterminado.
optionsThemeIntegrationExplanation.description: Explanation for the Theme Integration option in the options page.

notificationDeletedTitle.description: Title of the notification when deleting many tabs.

unmuteTabButtonTooltip.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=99190. Tooltip of the unmute icon on tabs, displayed on the favicon.

browserActionTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering the toolbar button.

contextMenuCloseTabs.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=197250. Context Menu item label

muteTabButtonTooltip.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=99188. Tooltip of the audible icon on tabs, displayed on the favicon.

newTabContextMenuOpenInPrivateWindow.description: Taken from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=75628. New Tab context menu item.

newTabContextMenuOpenInWindow.description: Take from Firefox: https://pontoon.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/all-resources/?string=75625. New Tab context menu item.

optionsCustomCSSChangelogLink.message: Revisa la lista de cambios en caso de incompatibilidades
optionsCustomCSSChangelogLink.description: Text for a link to the changelog.

optionsNotifyClosingManyTabs.message: Notificar cuando se cierren múltiples pestañas

optionsNotifyClosingManyTabsExplanation.message: Mostrar una notificación que permita deshacer cuando se cierren más de $COUNT$ pestañas.
optionsNotifyClosingManyTabsExplanation.description: Explanation for the Notify when closing many tabs option in options page.

optionsSwitchByScrolling.message: Cambiar de pestaña activa con la rueda de desplazamiento

optionsSwitchByScrollingWithCtrlExplanat.message: Activar la pestaña anterior o posterior en vez de desplazar, en ciertas circunstancias.
optionsSwitchByScrollingWithCtrlExplanat.description: Explanation for the Switch by scrolling options in options page.

optionsSwitchLastActiveTab.message: Cambiar a la pestaña anteriormente activa
